ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Including a new Processor
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to include the fully qualified classname of your new class in heritrix.properties to make new processors available in the web interface best Bjarne

<html><body>


<tt>
Hi all,<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
The last couple of days I've been writing a Processor to write the<BR>
results on a MySQL databse. Everything turned out to be ok so far,<BR>
except the fact that I can't see the new processor I have created on<BR>
the  modules section of Heritrix's web interface. Therefore, I cannot<BR>
include it in the jobs. Any solutions?<BR>
<BR>
I've used Maven to build it but Im running it on Eclipse (any chances<BR>
of a plugin of Maven 1.0.2 for Eclipse?) Im a bit new to Heritrix's<BR>
architecture, so forgive my ignorance.<BR>
<BR>
Thanks,<BR>
<BR>
Samuel Mendonca<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
</tt>


  




</body></html>




--Boundary_(ID_XAFzD7l8U3TKaZJXA56d7Q)
